TEXT.TITLE: CONGRESS VIDEO <CVGI> RESTRUCTURES MANAGEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Congress Video Group Inc said Lawrence Kieves has been appointed president and chief executive officer, replacing Morton Fry, who has left the company. Kieves was formerly chief financial officer and senior vice president, the company said. Reuter
